languages.text: "Никакие стены не укроют от яростного приговора Его, когда ересь восстания захлестнула целый мир".

traits.locale_text: "Никакие стены не укроют от яростного приговора Его, когда ересь восстания захлестнула целый мир".

languages.text: "Now that the heresy of rebellion has engulfed this entire world, no walls will offer shelter from His furious judgement."
languages.original_text: "Никакие стены не укроют от яростного приговора Его, когда ересь восстания захлестнула целый мир".

traits.locale_text: "Now that the heresy of rebellion has engulfed this entire world, no walls will offer shelter from His furious judgement."
"Now that the heresy of rebellion has engulfed this entire world, no walls will offer shelter from His furious judgement."
"Now that the heresy of rebellion has engulfed this entire world, no walls will offer shelter from His furious judgement."
"Now that the heresy of rebellion has engulfed this entire world, no walls will offer shelter from His furious judgement."
"Now that the heresy of rebellion has engulfed this entire world, no walls will offer shelter from His furious judgement."
"Now that the heresy of rebellion has engulfed this entire world, no walls will offer shelter from His furious judgement."

languages.text: «Ahora que la herejía de la rebelión ha devorado este mundo al completo, ningún muro ofrecerá refugio contra Su juicio iracundo».
languages.original_text: "Now that the heresy of rebellion has engulfed this entire world, no walls will offer shelter from His furious judgement."

languages.text: 「反逆の異端がこの惑星全体を飲み込んだ今、主の激怒のジャッジメントから身を守ってくれる壁はない」
languages.original_text: "Now that the heresy of rebellion has engulfed this entire world, no walls will offer shelter from His furious judgement."

languages.text: “异端叛乱的恶行已经吞噬了整个世界。如今，再也没有任何高墙能抵挡祂愤怒的审判。”
languages.original_text: "Now that the heresy of rebellion has engulfed this entire world, no walls will offer shelter from His furious judgement."

languages.text: "Nun, da die Ketzerei der Rebellion diese Welt vollständig erfasst hat, bieten keine Mauern Schutz vor Seinem wütenden Urteil."
languages.original_text: "Now that the heresy of rebellion has engulfed this entire world, no walls will offer shelter from His furious judgement."

languages.text: « Maintenant que l'hérésie de la rébellion a englouti ce monde, rien ne pourra protéger ses habitants de Son châtiment. »
languages.original_text: "Now that the heresy of rebellion has engulfed this entire world, no walls will offer shelter from His furious judgement."
"Now that the heresy of rebellion has engulfed this entire world, no walls will offer shelter from His furious judgement."

languages.text: "İsyanın kâfirliği artık tüm dünyayı sardığına göre dört duvar arasındaki hiçbir sığınak O'nun hiddetli hükmünden koruyamaz."
languages.original_text: "Now that the heresy of rebellion has engulfed this entire world, no walls will offer shelter from His furious judgement."
